mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, YEAR(CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING(c.identity, 7, 4) AS age, CASE c.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, c.blood_type, r.floor, r.room_number, f.name AS fName, f.tel, cir.nursing_level_id, b.bed_number FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id and f.state=1 WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.customer_id

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, YEAR(CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING(c.identity, 7, 4) AS age, CASE c.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, c.blood_type , r.floor , r.room_number , f.name AS fName, f.tel, cir.nursing_level_id, b.bed_number FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 and user_id=#{userId} JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id and f.state=1 ORDER BY c.customer_id

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, YEAR(CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING(c.identity, 7, 4) AS age, CASE c.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, c.identity, c.blood_type , r.floor , r.room_number , f.name AS fName, f.tel, cir.nursing_level_id, b.bed_number, cir.check_in_time, cir.end_time FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id and f.state=1 where user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY c.customer_id

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, YEAR(CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING(c.identity, 7, 4) AS age, CASE c.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, c.identity, c.blood_type , r.floor , r.room_number , f.name AS fName, f.tel, cir.nursing_level_id, b.bed_number, cir.check_in_time, cir.end_time FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id and f.state=1 where user_id=#{userId} and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY c.customer_id

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, YEAR(CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING(c.identity, 7, 4) AS age, CASE c.gender WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, c.identity, c.blood_type , r.floor , r.room_number , f.name AS fName, f.tel, cir.nursing_level_id, b.bed_number, cir.check_in_time, cir.end_time, c.image FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id and f.state=1 where c.tel=#{tel}

SELECT c.customer_id, c.image, c.name, CONCAT( r.building_number, '栋-', r.floor, '层-', r.room_number, '-', b.bed_number, '床' ) AS address, cir.nursing_level_id, cir.check_in_time, cir.end_time, u.user_name FROM t_customer c JOIN t_check_in_record cir ON c.customer_id = cir.customer_id AND cir.state = 1 LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = cir.user_id JOIN t_bed_record br ON cir.check_in_record_id = br.check_in_record_id AND br.state = 1 JOIN t_bed b ON br.bed_id = b.bed_id JOIN t_room r ON b.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_family f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId}
